row.process:
:DEFINE &RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, string :DEFINE &RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#, string
:SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_GLOBAL# = STR_CAT(" global=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"') :SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME_STR# = STR_CAT(" name=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"') :SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT("<Resource", &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME_STR#)
:SET &RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT("<ResourceLink", &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME_STR#) :SET &RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_GLOBAL#)
:SET &UC4RB_TC_DRIVER# = STR_CAT(" driverClassName=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DRIVER#"') :SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DRIVER#)
:SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_USER# = STR_CAT(" username=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_USER#"') :SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_USER#)
!:SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_PWD_STR# = STR_CAT(" password=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_PWD#"') :SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, ' password=""')
:SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_URL# = STR_CAT(" url=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_URL#"') :SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_URL#)
:SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_TYPE# = STR_CAT(" type=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_TYPE#"') :SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_TYPE#) :SET &RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_TYPE#)
:IF &UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABANDONED# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABANDONED# = STR_CAT(" removeAbandoned=", '"&UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABANDONED#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABANDONED#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABND_TIMEOUT# <> 300 : SET &UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABND_TIMEOUT# = STR_CAT(" removeAbandonedTimeout=", '"&UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABND_TIMEOUT#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_REMOVE_ABND_TIMEOUT#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DS_INITIAL_SIZE# <> "" OR "0" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_INITIAL_SIZE# = STR_CAT(" initialSize=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_INITIAL_SIZE#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_INITIAL_SIZE#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_ACTIVE# <> "" OR "8" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_ACTIVE# = STR_CAT(" maxActive=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_ACTIVE#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_ACTIVE#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DS_MIN_IDLE# <> "" OR "0" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_MIN_IDLE# = STR_CAT(" minIdle=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_MIN_IDLE#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_MIN_IDLE#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_IDLE# <> "" OR "8" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_IDLE# = STR_CAT(" maxIdle=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_IDLE#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_IDLE#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_WAIT# <> "" OR "-1" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_WAIT# = STR_CAT(" maxWait=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_WAIT#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DS_MAX_WAIT#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_LOG_ABANDONED# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_LOG_ABANDONED# = STR_CAT(" logAbandoned=", '"&UC4RB_TC_LOG_ABANDONED#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_LOG_ABANDONED#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_VALIDATION_QUERY# > "" : SET &UC4RB_TC_VALIDATION_QUERY# = STR_CAT(" validationQuery=", '"&UC4RB_TC_VALIDATION_QUERY#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_VALIDATION_QUERY#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_VALD_QUERY_TIMEOUT# <> -1 : SET &UC4RB_TC_VALD_QUERY_TIMEOUT# = STR_CAT(" validationQueryTimeout=", '"&UC4RB_TC_VALD_QUERY_TIMEOUT#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_VALD_QUERY_TIMEOUT#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_BORROW# = "NO" : SET &UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_BORROW# = STR_CAT(" testOnBorrow=", '"&UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_BORROW#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_BORROW#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_RETURN# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_RETURN# = STR_CAT(" testOnReturn=", '"&UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_RETURN#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_TEST_ON_RETURN#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_TIME_BETW_EVICT# <> 1800000 : SET &UC4RB_TC_TIME_BETW_EVICT# = STR_CAT(" timeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis=", '"&UC4RB_TC_TIME_BETW_EVICT#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_TIME_BETW_EVICT#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_NR_TEST_BETW_EVICT# <> 3 : SET &UC4RB_TC_NR_TEST_BETW_EVICT# = STR_CAT(" numTestsPerEvictionRun=", '"&UC4RB_TC_NR_TEST_BETW_EVICT#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_NR_TEST_BETW_EVICT#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_MIN_EVCT_IDLE_TIME# <> -1 : SET &UC4RB_TC_MIN_EVCT_IDLE_TIME# = STR_CAT(" minEvictableIdleTimeMillis=", '"&UC4RB_TC_MIN_EVCT_IDLE_TIME#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_MIN_EVCT_IDLE_TIME#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_TEST_WHILE_IDLE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_TEST_WHILE_IDLE# = STR_CAT(" testWhileIdle=", '"&UC4RB_TC_TEST_WHILE_IDLE#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_TEST_WHILE_IDLE#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_AUTO_COMMIT# = "NO" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_AUTO_COMMIT# = STR_CAT(" defaultAutoCommit =", '"&UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_AUTO_COMMIT#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_AUTO_COMMIT#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_READ_ONLY# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_READ_ONLY# = STR_CAT(" defaultReadOnly=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_READ_ONLY#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_READ_ONLY#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_TRANSACT_ISOL# <> "NO DEFAULT" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_TRANSACT_ISOL# = STR_CAT(" defaultTransactionIsolation=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_TRANSACT_ISOL#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_TRANSACT_ISOL#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_POOL_PREP_STATEMENTS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_POOL_PREP_STATEMENTS# = STR_CAT(" poolPreparedStatements=", '"&UC4RB_TC_POOL_PREP_STATEMENTS#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_POOL_PREP_STATEMENTS#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_MAX_OPEN_PREP_ST# <> -1 : SET &UC4RB_TC_MAX_OPEN_PREP_ST# = STR_CAT(" maxOpenPreparedStatements=", '"&UC4RB_TC_MAX_OPEN_PREP_ST#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_MAX_OPEN_PREP_ST#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_CATALOG# > "" : SET &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_CATALOG# = STR_CAT(" defaultCatalog=", '"&UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_CATALOG#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_DEFAULT_CATALOG#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_CONN_INIT_SQLS# > "" : SET &UC4RB_TC_CONN_INIT_SQLS# = STR_CAT(" connectionInitSqls=", '"&UC4RB_TC_CONN_INIT_SQLS#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_CONN_INIT_SQLS#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_CONN_PROPS# > "" : SET &UC4RB_TC_CONN_PROPS# = STR_CAT(" connectionProperties =", '"&UC4RB_TC_CONN_PROPS#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_CONN_PROPS#) :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TC_ACCESS_TO_UNDRL_CONN# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_TC_ACCESS_TO_UNDRL_CONN# = STR_CAT(" accessToUnderlyingConnectionAllowed=", '"&UC4RB_TC_ACCESS_TO_UNDRL_CONN#"') : SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, &UC4RB_TC_ACCESS_TO_UNDRL_CONN#) :ENDIF
:SET &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#, " />") :SET &RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT# = STR_CAT(&RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#, " />")
:PRINT &RESOURCE_ELEMENT# :PRINT &RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#
